overview:
Experienced “agile” tech team lead and infrastructure designer.

Guerry is currently the Lead Developer for adFreeq (www.adFreeq.com) and in the past was one of the original architects for Appistry. He has helped build several startups and has been part of successful exits. A team leader, software developer, architect and agile/lean coach, he has worked in all facets of software development including: product management, analysis, design, coding, testing, deployment. Guerry studied computer science at Duke University.
